name: Genetic Path Finding
description: Generates lots of agents with random moves. The ones with the best fitness are used to generate more agents to learn a path.

name: DJ Visualizer
description: , - halves bpm, . - doubles bpm, [ ] - shifts color theme, 1-4 - toggle effects, arrows - change bpm, spacebar - tap to learn BPM

name: Maze path finder
description: Generates random maze and uses BFS to make sure there is a path possible between them then visualizes how it searches the graph until it finds a path from the start point to the end point

name: Text Display
description: I was inspired to make something cute for displaying tiktok names on live or just any text in an interesting way

name: Langton's Ant
description: A large matrix where we can simulate Langton's Ant that has the simple rules: if white turn left, if black turn right

name: Conways Game of Life
description: With a twist, you can reverse the direction of time

name: PID Control
description: PID stands for proportional integral derivative which is a controller that will try to reach a state this interaction lets you change the constants and goal state

name: Hearts <3
description: Randomized heart animations for my love

name: Sheps :)
description: What it is like to kiss with my girlfriend

name: Triangles.
description: Random triangles popping up on your screen!

name: PID Race car
description: Small simulation with a car that uses PID to follow a wall. Click and drag to add obstacles

name: Base Calculator
description: Add number, its base A, and target base B this will convert the number from base A to base B

name: Dopler Effect Simulation
description: Dopler effect is the effect of having waves in motion this shows different vizualizations you can use

name: Stopwatch
description: Colorful stopwatch

name: Selection Sort
description: Sorting algorithm that picks the next best item to sort O(n¬≤), Œ©(n¬≤)

name: Insertion Sort
description: Sorting algorithm that swaps items until they are in the right place O(n¬≤), Œ©(n)

name: Merge Sort
description: Sorting algorithm that uses divide and conquer to sort smaller problems and combine them to sort an array O(n¬≤)

name: Lissajous Generator
description: Lissajous created by using circles with different periods

name: Flappy Bird
description: Remake of Flappy Bird, press space to jump

name: Asteroids
description: Remake of Asteroids, use arrow keys to more space to shoot

name: Drunk Walk
description: Shows brownian motion and the path the agent takes

name: Particle Interaction
description: Shows brownian motion with particles and allows you to see interactions

name: Wave Particles
description: Shows particles that move in circles, your mous position changes their period and their overall image

name: Angle PID
description: Test your agility! Dodge as three turrets use advanced PID control to target and hit your cursor. Can you outmaneuver them and survive?

name: Calculator
description: Simple arithmetic calculator

name: Bar Visualization
description: Simple metronome for 4 beat counts

name: Platformer
description: Platformer game to escape the lava!

name: Pretty Pendulums
description: Tried to replicate pretty pendulums from tiktok

name: Chaos Pendulums
description: 10 chaos pendulums and a movement path for each

name: Colors
description: Edit these colors with math!

name: Simulations
description: Generate many simulations of up or down randomness and see the disctibution at the end!

name: COVID Simulations
description: A simulation of infections where one can change the infection, recovery, and creation rates

name: Rocket Orbit
description: A rocket that you can control orbiting around a sun!

name: Snake
description: This snake game will always win!

name: SIN/COS simulation!
description: This demonstration shows how sin and cos are related!

name: Roomba algorithm
description: This is a simple line drawing robot, I tried to replicate how the roomba moves

name: Love Hate
description: A special dance between love and hate, shown with two sin waves

name: Leslie
description: A love story seen from above

name: Joseph Albers
description: Joseph Albers inspired digital art.

name: Simple Art
description: Inspired by the Museum of Modern Art San Fransisco.

name: Sin Words
description: Just a cool way to show words moving in a sin wave

name: Pointer
description: Cool way to emphasize the cursor

name: Graffitti
description: Brick graffitti maker!

name: Fireworks
description: Toggle your firework show!

name: Turtles all the way down!
description: Do we have free will?

name: Get bigger after every collision
description: I made the tiktok video where the ball gets bigger after every collision

name: 3D Cubes
description: test project to learn webgl in p5

name: Towers of Hanoi!
description: Recursion at its finest

name: Star Wars Hyper Drive!
description: What it feels like to be in the millenium falcon and hit hyperdrive

name: Universal Entity
description: Rozzi Roomian inspired art. What it feels to be in the universe. My interpretation: What it feels like to be god.

name: PI estimation
description: Generate random points and check if they lie within a circle, use this to approximate PI

name: Mandelbrot Set Explorer
description: See this simple and complex mathematical wonder!

name: Three Body Problem
description: An un solvable problem. How do you create a stable orbit with 3 objects of roughly the same size? Turns out you cant.

name: Linear Regression
description: Use least squares to find a line that can make a linear regression of some points I generate!

name: Draw Classifier
description: Draw an image and press C to see what the image classifiers guess for what it is. Disclaimer this is pretty bad.

name: Image Classifier
description: Upload an image and see what the image classifiers guess for what it is.

name: Circle Bounce Music
description: Ball bounces and every bounce it plays twinkle twinkle little star aye

name: Theramin
description: Use your hand position to change the freqency of the instrument!

name: Smile Fireworks
description: When you smile CV detects your smile and gives you a fireworks show, my cheeks hurt from smiling so much!

name: Sisyphus
description: Help Sisyphus push his boulder up the mountain, only for it to roll back down again. A metaphor for the human condition.

name: 3D Pipes Screensaver
description: A 3D recreation of the classic Windows pipes screensaver. Watch as colorful pipes grow and wind their way through 3D space.

name: Windows Ball Morph
description: A 3D morphing cube with colored faces that bounces around the screen, inspired by classic Windows screensavers. Watch as the cube transforms and rotates while bouncing off invisible boundaries.

name: NEAT Racing Game
description: Cars evolve using neural networks to navigate a race track. Watch as AI cars learn to drive through generations of evolution using the NEAT algorithm.

name: Pulse Concentric
description: Concentric circles pulse outward from the center with customizable frequency, growth speed, and rainbow colors. Control the visual parameters with interactive sliders and color checkboxes.

name: Butterfly Swarm
description: 3D animated red butterflies with shimmering white star dust trails. Watch hundreds of butterflies float upward leaving magical particle effects.

name: Golden Ratio Spiral
description: Watch Fibonacci squares grow in a perfect spiral! Press SPACE to add the next square, R to reset, and use +/- to zoom as you visualize the golden ratio in action.

name: Rock Paper Scissors Simulation
description: Hundreds of rock, paper, and scissors emojis bounce and convert each other on collision, following RPS rules. Watch populations evolve in real time with animated graphs and stats tracking.

name: Color Grid War
description: A black and white color grid is split down the middle. Two bouncing balls collide with the boundary and convert blocks to their side's color, struggling for control of the entire grid.

name: Vector Field
description: Dynamic arrow grid that points toward your cursor, creating beautiful vector field visualizations. Adjust grid density with the slider for different effects.

name: Travelling Salesman
description: Interactive travelling salesman visualization using a 2-opt heuristic. Watch the path shorten in real time, reshuffle the route, or regenerate random points.

name: Graph Coloring
description: Generate a random graph and watch a backtracking solver color it in real time. Pause, resume, and tweak the node count to see how complexity changes.
